properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 14 at 11:13AM CST until January 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County
Big Sunflower River Near Anguilla affecting Sharkey County

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Big Sunflower River Near Anguilla
* from late tonight to Friday morning.
* At 10:00 AM Tuesday the stage was 44.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 45.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage just
after midnight tonight.

* Impact...At 45.0 feet...Minor flooding is occurring along the State
Highway 14 bridge.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.


Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
